POST / HTTP/1.1

Content-Type: application/json

<公共请求参数>

    "InstanceId": "cdb-aykuksx3",
    "ProxyGroupId": "proxy-il2nlsdn",
    "ReloadBalance": "auto",
    "UpgradeTime": "nowTime",
    "ProxyNodeCustom": [
        {
            "NodeCount": 2,
            "Region": "ap-guangzhou",
            "Zone": "ap-guangzhou-1",
            "Cpu": 3,
            "Mem": 4
        }
    ]
}

POST / HTTP/1.1

            "Region": "ap-guangzhou",

                {
                    "InstanceId": "cdb-aykuksx3",
                    "Weight": 100
                }
            ]
        }
    ]
}
